title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learn web development from scratch with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
prerequisites: No prior coding experience required, basic understanding of computer science concepts is helpful.
certification: Upon completion, receive a certificate of completion in Web Development.
support: 24/7 technical support and Q&A sessions to address queries and challenges.
networking: Opportunities to connect with industry professionals and alumni for networking.
tools: Introduction to popular development tools, IDEs, and frameworks used in the industry.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
description: Master data analysis and visualization with Python and data science tools.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of programming and statistics is helpful.
certification: Upon completion, receive a certificate in Data Science Fundamentals.
support: Access to mentors and dedicated forums for clearing doubts.
projects: Hands-on projects to apply data science concepts in real-world scenarios.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native.
prerequisites: Familiarity with JavaScript and basic mobile app concepts is recommended.
certification: Receive a certificate upon successful completion of the course.
support: Interactive online sessions and code reviews by experienced developers.
tools: Hands-on experience with popular mobile app development tools and platforms.

title: Machine Learning Essentials
description: Explore the fundamentals of machine learning and artificial intelligence.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of programming, statistics, and linear algebra is recommended.
certification: Earn a certificate upon successful completion of machine learning projects and assessments.
fees: $XXX (Includes all necessary software and learning materials)
support: Dedicated mentors and peer collaboration for effective learning.
projects: Hands-on machine learning projects with real-world datasets.

title: Full-Stack JavaScript Development
description: Learn how to build full-stack web applications with JavaScript, Node.js, and React.
prerequisites: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic understanding of backend technologies.
certification: Receive a comprehensive certificate upon successful completion of all modules and projects.
fees: $XXX (Includes access to online development environments and project hosting)
support: 24/7 coding assistance and regular code reviews for improvement.
projects: Develop and deploy full-stack web applications with real clients.

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Get started with AI and explore its applications in various fields.
certification: Receive a certificate upon completion of AI projects and assessments.
fees: $XXX (Includes all necessary software and learning materials)
support: Expert-led workshops and hands-on AI projects for practical learning.

title: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency
description: Understand blockchain technology and the world of cryptocurrencies.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of computer networks and cryptography concepts.
certification: Receive a certificate upon successful completion of blockchain projects and assessments.
fees: $XXX (Includes all necessary software and learning materials)
support: Live coding sessions and collaboration with industry experts.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity and how to protect digital assets.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of computer networks and operating systems.
certification: Receive a cybersecurity certification upon successful completion of assessments and practical exams.
support: Access to virtual labs and real-time simulations for hands-on experience.

title: Art and Design for Beginners
description: Explore your creative side with art and design fundamentals.
certification: Receive a certificate upon completion of art projects and evaluations.
support: Individual feedback sessions and creative workshops with professional artists.

title: Business Management Essentials
description: Gain essential skills for effective business management and leadership.
certification: Receive a business management certificate upon completion of projects and case studies.
fees: $XXX (Includes course materials and access to business analysis tools)
support: Interactive case studies and guest lectures from industry leaders.
